short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best spy tool to find your winning product!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drawmyshop becomes PrivAdSpy

**THE ULTIMATE PRODUCT RESEARCH & ADS SPYING TOOL**

PrivAdspy helps you find winning products before they go viral, discover high-performing creative Ads in your niche, and keep track of your competitors’ results to replicate their success and help you stand out as the best option for your target audience.

**Stop guessing and start growing with the smartest Ad spying tool.**

Stop draining your time & money on burned products and unprofitable Ads.

PrivAdspy helps you find winning products relevant to your business, spot profitable competitors' Ad campaigns, angles of messages, and provides a wide range of powerful competitive insights.

****PRIVADSPY KEY FEATURES AT A GLANCE****

• **DISCOVER COMPELLING NEW ADS & CAMPAIGNS**

PrivAdspy offers a full suite of exhaustive search, filters, and competitor tracking features that will help you uncover the ads that you and your company need to know about.

• **UNCOVER THRIVING NEW PRODUCTS TO PROMOTE**

Easily discover and track what products advertisers in your niche are promoting. Keep track of their performance and spot winning products before they go viral.

• **BROWSE ADS BY WHAT’S MOST IMPORTANT**

Search by text and keywords in ad copies, Ad images and Ad videos, the advertiser’s name, website...
Then sort the results with clever filters.

• **COLLECT YOUR FAVORITE ADS, PRODUCTS & PAGES**

Save interesting ads, products, and competitors' pages to your private collections for future reference and easy monitoring.

• **ACCESS AD POSTS TO ANALYZE ENGAGEMENT**

Access links of running ads, to get better insights on their performance and analyze comments, customers feedback, and ad engagement…

• **GET HIGHLY VALUABLE INSIGHTS**

PrivAdspy reveals highly valuable insights on the performance of your competitors’ ad campaigns: Last ad created, longest running ad, daily order count of Shopify stores, and so much more…

.**CHATGPT AT YOUR FINGERTIPS**

PrivAdSpy vous met à disposition chatGPT pour vous aidez dans vos taches pour gagner du temps et gagner en créativité.
You can use it to write product descriptions, find the right keywords for the niches you're looking for, etc.

**How PrivAdspy is different?**

• **Ads Displayed in Real Time**

While Ad spying tools promise you X million products, what they forget to tell you is that their tool is a giant graveyard of dead and buried products...

When spying on your market segment to find winning products and get your fingers on the pulse of your niche, what really counts is the new trending products added every day, the new marketing angles, the creatives, and messages your competitors use...

**PrivAdspy** is based on the "Meta™ Advertising Library" to deliver all the ads in real-time. No more missing a product because your Ad spying tool hasn't added it to its database yet or because it was added long after it was saturated.

• **New winning products everyday**

Forget about opening your Ad Spying tool every morning to find the same products as the day before over and over again. Hundreds of thousands of products are launched on Meta™ everyday, and thanks to our advantage you can find ALL of them the second they go live.

• **Get Your Own Custom-Picked Ad Spy**

One of the main problems with ad spying tools is that they show the same few old winning products to everyone. And testing the same old products as everyone else is the easiest way to burn your money.

With **PrivAdspy**, you can build your own private, customized version of spying and keep an eye on every product your competitors or companies in your industry are testing.

**• Relevant data to spot winning products**

Having all the ads is not enough to make smart decisions about your next product or Ad campaign. **PrivAdspy** offers a full suite of valuable insights to help you get a better understanding of the status and performance of your competitors' most profitable products and Ads.

When was the product published? What is the targeted country(ies)? When was the last order placed?...Answers to these questions are golden nuggets that only **PrivAdSpy** can provide.

If you have any questions or need any help, our customer support team is available anytime during the week, they are more than happy to help. Feel free to contact us using the form on our website. ---> https://privadspy.com
